title: HBSWANY Holiday Party
desc: Join fellow HBSWANY members for an evening of holiday cheer and conversation on Thursday, December 3rd before the holidays kick into full gear. There will be a selection of wine, holiday beverages, appetizers and festive desserts. Attendees will have the opportunity to walk away with some great prizes from the raffle hosted at the event.  All raffle proceeds will go towards our Women's Inspirational fund, which provides a partial scholarship each year to support a HBS woman student from NYC.    Please RSVP for the event and raffle. $20 goes towards the party expenses and $5 buys you a raffle ticket. You can buy additional raffle tickets for $5/ticket.?Raffle items include?a variety of Coach purses, Nest candles, Nest creams and other items.    Details:   Date : December 3, 2015   Time : 6:30 ? 9:30 p.m.    Location : Near 26th & 8th Avenue -  Exact address to be released when you register.
